attributes.description:
This Ford Ranger Raptor 2.0D Bi-Turbo 4x4 Automatic Double Cab comes with black leather interior, multi functional steering wheel, aircon, LCD radio/CD entertainment system, cruise control, keyless start, electric windows, electric folding side mirrors, blue tooth, paddle gear shift, lane assist, side steps, roll bar, roll-top bin cover, tow bar, PDC, rear camera, bull bar and 17" alloy wheels. This vehicle has got full service history with accredited Ford service agents. Last service done on 2021/11/08 @ 15123 Km's. This vehicle has got accredited Ford Warranty from 2021/06/30 and expires on 2027/06/30 or 91500 Km's. This vehicle has got 5 remaining maintenance services contract for 15 000 Km's intervals.


Finance Available.
Trade in's are welcome.

T& C's Apply.
E&OE Apply.

attributes.description: Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short-change you. Visit our website to see our full range of stock. A 1% of the value of the vehicle non-refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another non-refundable deposit to secure it further. Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!

attributes.description: Excellent Condition, Comfortline Diesel with a Full Service History! BB Group is a well-established Franchise with a wide variety. We strive to give excellent service. All Trade-ins are welcome. A Full and Detailed Workshop Quality Inspection is Done on Each of the vehicles along with a AA Dekra Roadworthy test prior to any Delivery taken. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our valued customers. For Excellent Service Contact our Sales Manager – Linden Jacobs As part of a 60-year legacy, this fully-fledged automotive dealer group offers New Cars, Used Cars, Parts, and services to all existing and potential customers. With us, you can always expect a little more and once you’re a client, it is hardly a fleeting experience but potentially a life-long partnership. To find out more about this vehicle, contact the dealer now.
